fullText: â€œIsnâ€™t it amazing how token prediction can fool people who donâ€™t understand AI into imagining intelligence where all there is regurgitation and style transfer?â€ https://t.co/LhA5XiEM7r

SaaS companies competed by passing efficiencies to customers by reducing prices.

AI companies will do this by expending more compute per query.

Itâ€™s a mistake to think tokens getting cheaper means lower prices or better margins.
